verses.name: Isaiah 54:7
verses.text: For a small moment have I forsaken thee; but with great mercies will I gather thee.

verses.name: Isaiah 54:8
verses.text: In a little wrath I hid my face from thee for a moment; but with everlasting kindness will I have mercy on thee, saith the Lord thy Redeemer.

verses.name: Isaiah 54:9
verses.text: For this is as the waters of Noah unto me: for as I have sworn that the waters of Noah should no more go over the earth; so have I sworn that I would not be wroth with thee, nor rebuke thee.
